Tests how split widget saving to settings works.

Create default split widget
Running split widget test with the following parameters: useFraction = false, shouldSaveShowMode = false
Creating split widget
    Sidebar size = 100, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 100, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 101, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 201, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 201, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 201, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201},"horizontal":{"size":202}}

Create default split widget
Running split widget test with the following parameters: useFraction = false, shouldSaveShowMode = true
Creating split widget
    Sidebar size = 100, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0,"showMode":"Both"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 100, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0,"showMode":"Both"}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"Both"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"Both"}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 101, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":0,"showMode":"Both"}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 201, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"Both"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 200, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 201, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"Both"}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"Both"}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 201, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":201,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":202,"showMode":"Both"}}

Create default split widget
Running split widget test with the following parameters: useFraction = true, shouldSaveShowMode = false
Creating split widget
    Sidebar size = 114, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 114, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 119, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 129, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 129, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 129, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125},"horizontal":{"size":130}}

Create default split widget
Running split widget test with the following parameters: useFraction = true, shouldSaveShowMode = true
Creating split widget
    Sidebar size = 114, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0,"showMode":"Both"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 114, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":0,"showMode":"Both"}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"Both"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"Both"}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 119, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":0,"showMode":"Both"}}
Resizing
    Sidebar size = 129, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"Both"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 124, showMode = Both, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"Both"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Hiding sidebar
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"OnlyMain"}}
Showing sidebar
    Sidebar size = 129, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"Both"}}
Recreating split widget
    Sidebar size = 0, showMode = OnlyMain, vertical
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"Both"}}
Making horizontal
    Sidebar size = 129, showMode = Both, horizontal
    Setting value: {"vertical":{"size":125,"showMode":"OnlyMain"},"horizontal":{"size":130,"showMode":"Both"}}
